"Multi-Weapon":
"\"Multi-Weapon\" is a system that lets you combine the abilities of two different weapons, such as a Sword and a Rifle.

You can register actions from both weapons on the same weapon palette."

"When you use an action, your Multi-Weapon will immediately switch to the appropriate form and perform the action.

When performing shared actions, such as your Photon Blast, the action that occurs is based on the weapon's current form."

"Multi-Weapons can be created at the Item Lab.
You can only combine weapons from the same series, such as a Prim Sword and a Prim Rifle."
